maml:description.maml:para: Get private store list
Get private store list that were created under tenant scope
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with Azure.
{{ Fill ProgressAction Description }}
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with Azure.
{{ Fill ProgressAction Description }}

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Get-AzMarketplacePrivateStore
Availability : enabled PrivateStoreId : 7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d ETag : "47006253-0000-0100-0000-5ecb6df90000" Id : /providers/Microsoft.Marketplace/privateStores/7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d Name : 7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d Type : Microsoft.Marketplace/privateStores

dev:remarks.maml:para: private store list that were created under tenant scope

maml:description.maml:para: Get one or more private store's offer.

Get one or more private store's offer with public + private plans that were added under tenant scope. If subscription id is presents, get one or more private store's offer with private plans only under subscription scope
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with Azure.
Required Azure Marketplace privateStore offer
Required Azure Marketplace privateStore offers
{{ Fill ProgressAction Description }}
Azure Marketplace subscription id
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with Azure.
Required Azure Marketplace privateStore offer
Required Azure Marketplace privateStore offers
{{ Fill ProgressAction Description }}
Azure Marketplace subscription id

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Get-AzMarketplacePrivateStoreOffer -PrivateStoreId 7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d
UniqueOfferId : publisherid.offerid OfferDisplayName : PublisherDisplayName : ETag : "04009182-0000-0100-0000-5ecd2fb00000" PrivateStoreId : 7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d CreatedBy : CreatedDate : 01/01/0001 00:00:00 SpecificPlanIdsLimitation : {small, medium-with-upgraded-bandwidth, medium-with-upgraded-apps, large, large-pr, small-pr} Id : /providers/Microsoft.Marketplace/privateStores/7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d/offers/ publisherid.offerid Name : publisherid.offerid Type : Microsoft.Marketplace/privateStores/offers
UniqueOfferId : publisherid1.offerid1 OfferDisplayName : PublisherDisplayName : ETag : "00009568-0000-0100-0000-5ec4f9590000" PrivateStoreId : 7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d CreatedBy : CreatedDate : 01/01/0001 00:00:00 SpecificPlanIdsLimitation : {azure_managedservices_professional ,azure_managedservices_professional-pr} Id : /providers/Microsoft.Marketplace/privateStores/7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d/offers/ publisherid1.offerid1 Name : publisherid1.offerid1 Type : Microsoft.Marketplace/privateStores/offers

dev:remarks.maml:para: Get private store's offers with private + public plans that were added under tenant scope.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Get-AzMarketplacePrivateStoreOffer -PrivateStoreId 7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d -SubscriptionId bc17bb69-1264-4f90-a9f6-0e51e29d5281
UniqueOfferId : publisherid.offerid OfferDisplayName : PublisherDisplayName : ETag : "04009182-0000-0100-0000-5ecd2fb00000" PrivateStoreId : 7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d CreatedBy : CreatedDate : 01/01/0001 00:00:00 SpecificPlanIdsLimitation : {large-pr, small-pr} Id : /subscriptions/bc17bb69-1264-4f90-a9f6-0e51e29d5281/providers/Microsoft.Marketplace/privateStores/7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d/offers/ publisherid.offerid Name : publisherid.offerid Type : Microsoft.Marketplace/privateStores/offers
UniqueOfferId : publisherid1.offerid1 OfferDisplayName : PublisherDisplayName : ETag : "00009568-0000-0100-0000-5ec4f9590000" PrivateStoreId : 7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d CreatedBy : CreatedDate : 01/01/0001 00:00:00 SpecificPlanIdsLimitation : {azure_managedservices_professional-pr} Id : /subscriptions/bc17bb69-1264-4f90-a9f6-0e51e29d5281/providers/Microsoft.Marketplace/privateStores/7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d/offers/ publisherid1.offerid1 Name : publisherid1.offerid1 Type : Microsoft.Marketplace/privateStores/offers

dev:remarks.maml:para: Get private store's offers with private plans only that were added under subscription scope.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 3 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Get-AzMarketplacePrivateStoreOffer -PrivateStoreId 7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d -OfferId publisherid.offerid
UniqueOfferId : publisherid.offerid OfferDisplayName : PublisherDisplayName : ETag : "04009182-0000-0100-0000-5ecd2fb00000" PrivateStoreId : 7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d CreatedBy : CreatedDate : 01/01/0001 00:00:00 SpecificPlanIdsLimitation : {small, medium-with-upgraded-bandwidth, medium-with-upgraded-apps, large, large-pr, small-pr} Id : /providers/Microsoft.Marketplace/privateStores/7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d/offers/ publisherid.offerid Name : publisherid.offerid Type : Microsoft.Marketplace/privateStores/offers

dev:remarks.maml:para: Get private store's offer with private + public plans that was been added under tenant scope.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 4 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Get-AzMarketplacePrivateStoreOffer -PrivateStoreId 7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d -OfferId publisherid.offerid -SubscriptionId bc17bb69-1264-4f90-a9f6-0e51e29d5281
UniqueOfferId : publisherid.offerid OfferDisplayName : PublisherDisplayName : ETag : "04009182-0000-0100-0000-5ecd2fb00000" PrivateStoreId : 7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d CreatedBy : CreatedDate : 01/01/0001 00:00:00 SpecificPlanIdsLimitation : {large-pr, small-pr} Id : /subscriptions/bc17bb69-1264-4f90-a9f6-0e51e29d5281/providers/Microsoft.Marketplace/privateStores/7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d/offers/ publisherid.offerid Name : publisherid.offerid Type : Microsoft.Marketplace/privateStores/offers

dev:remarks.maml:para: Get private store's offer with private plans only that was been added under tenant scope.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Set-AzMarketplacePrivateStoreOffer -privateStoreId 7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d -offerId publisherid.offerid -SpecificPlanIdsLimitation @("PublisherEnterpriseLinux72", "PublisherEnterpriseLinux72-ARM", "PublisherEnterpriseLinux73", "PublisherEnterpriseLinux73-ARM ", "PublisherEnterpriseLinux73-ARM-pr")
UniqueOfferId : publisherid.offerid OfferDisplayName : PublisherDisplayName : ETag : "04009562-0000-0600-0000-5ecd2fb00000" PrivateStoreId : 7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d CreatedBy : CreatedDate : 01/01/0001 00:00:00 SpecificPlanIdsLimitation : {PublisherEnterpriseLinux72, PublisherEnterpriseLinux72-ARM, PublisherEnterpriseLinux73, PublisherEnterpriseLinux73-ARM, PublisherEnterpriseLinux73-ARM-pr} Id : /providers/Microsoft.Marketplace/privateStores/7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d/offers/ publisherid.offerid Name : publisherid.offerid Type : Microsoft.Marketplace/privateStores/offers

dev:remarks.maml:para: Creates offer with private + public plans for private store that was created under tenant scope.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Set-AzMarketplacePrivateStoreOffer -privateStoreId 7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d -offerId publisherid.offerid -SubscriptionId bc17bb69-1264-4f90-a9f6-0e51e29d5281 -SpecificPlanIdsLimitation @("PublisherEnterpriseLinux72", "PublisherEnterpriseLinux72-ARM", "PublisherEnterpriseLinux73", "PublisherEnterpriseLinux73-ARM ", "PublisherEnterpriseLinux73-ARM-pr")
UniqueOfferId : publisherid.offerid OfferDisplayName : PublisherDisplayName : ETag : "04009562-0000-0600-0000-5ecd2fb00000" PrivateStoreId : 7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d CreatedBy : CreatedDate : 01/01/0001 00:00:00 SpecificPlanIdsLimitation : {PublisherEnterpriseLinux73-ARM-pr} Id : /subscriptions/bc17bb69-1264-4f90-a9f6-0e51e29d5281/providers/Microsoft.Marketplace/privateStores/7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d/offers/ publisherid.offerid Name : publisherid.offerid Type : Microsoft.Marketplace/privateStores/offers

dev:remarks.maml:para: Creates offer with private plans only for private store that was created under subscription scope.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 3 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Set-AzMarketplacePrivateStoreOffer -privateStoreId 7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d -offerId publisherid.offerid -SpecificPlanIdsLimitation @("PublisherEnterpriseLinux72", "PublisherEnterpriseLinux72-ARM", "PublisherEnterpriseLinux73") -ETag 04009562-0000-0600-0000-5ecd2fb00000
UniqueOfferId : publisherid.offerid OfferDisplayName : PublisherDisplayName : ETag : "02009562-0000-0600-0120-3ecd2fb00000" PrivateStoreId : 7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d CreatedBy : CreatedDate : 01/01/0001 00:00:00 SpecificPlanIdsLimitation : {PublisherEnterpriseLinux72, PublisherEnterpriseLinux72-ARM, PublisherEnterpriseLinux73} Id : /providers/Microsoft.Marketplace/privateStores/7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d/offers/ publisherid.offerid Name : publisherid.offerid Type : Microsoft.Marketplace/privateStores/offers

dev:remarks.maml:para: Updates offer with private + public plans for private store that was created under tenant scope. Etag is needed.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 4 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Set-AzMarketplacePrivateStoreOffer -privateStoreId 7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d -offerId publisherid.offerid -SubscriptionId bc17bb69-1264-4f90-a9f6-0e51e29d5281 -SpecificPlanIdsLimitation @("PublisherEnterpriseLinux73-pr") -ETag 04009562-0000-0600-0000-5ecd2fb00000
UniqueOfferId : publisherid.offerid OfferDisplayName : PublisherDisplayName : ETag : "02009562-0000-0600-0120-3ecd2fb00000" PrivateStoreId : 7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d CreatedBy : CreatedDate : 01/01/0001 00:00:00 SpecificPlanIdsLimitation : {PublisherEnterpriseLinux73-pr} Id : /subscriptions/bc17bb69-1264-4f90-a9f6-0e51e29d5281/providers/Microsoft.Marketplace/privateStores/7gh67884-1r56-44fb-a93d-030d4ae08b2d/offers/ publisherid.offerid Name : publisherid.offerid Type : Microsoft.Marketplace/privateStores/offers

dev:remarks.maml:para: Updates offer for private store with private plans only that was created under subscription scope. Etag is needed.
